PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-10682013-10-09,  ,  ,  ND,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Queen's Regulations and Orders for the Canadian Forces
PrecisRegulations Amending the QUEEN'S REGULATIONS AND ORDERS FOR THE CANADIAN FORCES in order to implement the majority of the recommendations of the 2003 Lamer Report related to military justice, the grievance process and military police issues, and respond to a number of recommendations made by the Standing Senate Committee on Legal and Constitutional Affairs.
AttachmentsAttachment
